title: Mayura Kundan Stud Earrings - Peacock Design
features: Exquisite peacock motif, intricately detailed with high-quality Kundan stones and accents of Ruby and Emerald. Teardrop shape with delicate openwork design enhances the overall sparkle. Traditional peacock representation with contemporary stud earring setting.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
or any special celebration. These statement earrings will add a touch of glamour to your traditional attire.
description: Combines traditional South Indian craftsmanship with modern earring design. The Mayura (peacock) symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and love, making these earrings a meaningful gift or a cherished addition to your jewelry collection. High-quality materials ensure lasting shine and durability. Perfect for adding a touch of glamour to your wedding reception, they seamlessly blend timeless tradition with contemporary style.
